description: Performance is your absolute priority – but happy feet are a close second. These all-mountain boots deliver the goods for skiers with high expectations for comfort and performance. The high-end IF Comp liner is ready to ski straight out of the box, but thermo-moulding adds a level of boot bliss that's outta this world. With medium-stiff flex, these suit skilled skiers looking to up their game and raise the bar for 'best season ever'.Lightweight shell construction reduces weight without compromising stability.Power Cage provides light framework for great control and power transfer.Cabrio 3 piece shell design flexes consistently and absorbs shock.Variable volume fit allows adjustment of the forefoot width.Contour 4 fit technology fits securely while allowing extra room where needed.Adjustable rear cuff lets you customize the boot's height to your calf.Dynalink heel strap keeps the foot from sliding.Grip Walk soles allow nearly-normal walking with a rockered design.Dura-grip replaceable heels and toes.
name: Dalbello Panterra 120 GW Boots - Unisex
